data.text: Wuoda, ka isechiwo singo ni jabathi,
ka diponi omaki nikech gima ne iwacho,
to tim kama, wuoda, mondo ibed thuolo,
Kik iwe nindo ohingi,
To resri ibed thuolo, mana kaka mwanda mayombo jadwar,
In janyawo, dhi ir biye;
Biye onge jatelo
to kata kamano, gikano chiembgi e ndalo oro,
In jasamuoyo, nyaka karangʼo ma ibiro bedo kinindo aninda kanyo?
Nindo matin, ayula wangʼ matin,
to dhier biro monji ka janjore
Ngʼat mamono kendo jaricho
oningʼo wangʼe,
ochano richo kod miriambo ei chunye,
Kuom mano, masira biro make maloye apoya nono;
Nitie gik moko auchiel ma Jehova Nyasaye mon-go,
wenge mag sunga,
chuny machano chenro maricho,
jahang wach mawacho miriambo
Wuoda, rit chike wuonu
Kan-gi ka ipandogi e chunyi nyaka chiengʼ;
Ka iwuotho, to gibiro chiki;
Nikech chikegi gin taya,
mamiyo ibedo mabor gi dhako mandhaga kaachiel
Kik ber mare mineno gi wangʼ omi chunyi gombe
Nikech ochot nyalo miyo ibed matin maromo gi nengo makati,
Bende ngʼato nyalo tingʼo mach e kore,
Bende ngʼato nyalo wuotho e mirni mar mach maliel,
Ma e kaka ngʼat ma terore gi chi ngʼat machielo chalo;
Ji ok cha jakuo kokwalo chiemo
Kata kamano ka omake, to nyaka ochul nyadibiriyo,
To ngʼat ma terore gi chi ngʼat machielo onge gi rieko,
Pokne en chwat kod wichkuot
Nimar nyiego mamako chwor dhakono nyalo kelo tho,
Ok enoyie chudo moro amora;
